ingredients.ingredient: 1 cup masa harina, or as needed
¾ cup hot tap water, about 130 degrees F (55 degrees C)

cookingTips: Use hot water to develop the dough's elasticity properly
Press dough between plastic wrap to prevent sticking
Cook on hot cast iron or griddle 30 seconds per side until puffed
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user on achieving the right dough consistency and the importance of proper heat for authentic corn tortillas.
